summary: This document appears to be a collection of text message excerpts from August 2019, discussing a special hearing for victims in the Epstein case, confirming an address, and providing reassurance and support to a recipient. It shows communication between individuals involved in the case, likely a victim/witness and a support contact or legal representative.

events.title: Special Hearing for Victims
events.description: A judge is having a special hearing for the victims of the Epstein case, as reported in a text message.

keyFacts: A special hearing for victims in the Epstein case was scheduled by a judge on or around August 26, 2019.
Text messages show an address was being confirmed and passed to an unspecified party.
A supportive message advises the recipient 'u r in control of this vehicle' and to speak up if they don't agree with something.
The communication indicates outreach to check on someone's well-being and to answer their questions.
The document is an email from December 2019 containing screenshots of text messages from August 2019.
